title: LVOC (LoL Language Changer) Potential punishments?
body:
Here's is a website that is in short called, "LVOC" https://lexwah.com/lvoc/
          It lets you change the LoL client voice for champions. I've heard it's safe account wise but I really do want to make sure it is. You can't be banned for changing champion voices to a different language correct? It won't appear as some sort of bug or tampering that proves as a unfair advantage?

replies.body:
Any and all [**third party programs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) have the potential to be damaging to your account. Our official stance is that we don't allow any software that would directly interfere with gameplay yes, but there's also a chance that LVOC could contain something malicious to your own pc or could be altering gameplay without your knowledge. 

It's best not to use any third party programs at all; remember the risks involved with doing so.
